post:
bodHOST offers you numerous VPS hosting offers to choose from, which means you have full control over your machine and use it for growing your business. You get your share of the server and can run your business without any interruptions. Get what you pay for, with some of the features that are unique only to us. Our servers are geared towards businesses of all kind and it shouldn’t take anytime to get your server setup.

Let’s look inside the plans…shall we?

Linux VPS Servers:

VPS Basic
  • CPU: 2 vCPUs
  • HDD: 40 GB
  • Bandwidth: 1TB
  • RAM: 2 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $29.99/month

VPS Standard
  • CPU: 4 vCPUs
  • HDD: 60 GB
  • Bandwidth: 1.5 TB
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $44.99/month

VPS Enterprise

  • Bandwidth: 2 TB

  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $59.99/month

VPS Corporate

  • RAM: 8 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $74.99/month
